column5: Nice it actually worked LOL. Real time fishing reports from the boat ???
Another try. Teaching him young hope he gets his first fish this year.
Good lookin' lad.  Kids are great aren't they?
They sure are doesn't matter how crappy a day your having they can make you smile. But when they get older it doesn't matter how good a day your having a teenager can ruine it lol. Thanks guys

Almost makes me want to get a black berry... I'm too cheep who am I kidding lol!  Look forward to a post for every fish you catch now hahahaha. Just make sure you put the fish in the water before you start posting
